verses.name: Ezekiel 7:17
verses.text: All hands shall be feeble, and all knees shall be weak as water.

verses.name: Ezekiel 7:18
verses.text: They shall also gird themselves with sackcloth, and horror shall cover them; and shame shall be upon all faces, and baldness upon all their heads.

verses.name: Ezekiel 7:19
verses.text: They shall cast their silver in the streets, and their gold shall be removed: their silver and their gold shall not be able to deliver them in the day of the wrath of the Lord: they shall not satisfy their souls, neither fill their bowels: because it is the stumblingblock of their iniquity.
